thread.title: Jimmy Bird
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Jimmy Bird

author: Jimmy Bird
title: Jimmy Bird
text:
Excellent. Matt is an excellent sales person. Very knowledge & caring. Wants to make sure customers r 100% satisfied. Pelican is an excellent company to do business with. They have answered all my questions. They make sure that if I have any questions in the future that I call them back. They r here to help. Technical support is excellent also
Thanks
